amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit the DOD from carrying out the President's Administration climate change executive orders.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Department of Defense from carrying out the Administration's climate change executive orders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 216 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Roy.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
